short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear cookies, cache, browsing history, and other site data for selected time range.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple data cleanup extension for your web browser.

🖱️ The extension deletes the data based on the user's actions only. 

⏱️ Ability to choose the time range to clear definite data: Last Hour, Last 24 Hours, Last 7 Days, Last 4 Weeks, and All Time.

🗑️ Clear the Basic data: Cookies (cookies), Cache (cache, appcache, cacheStorage), Browsing History (history), and Download History (downloads).

👨‍💻 Clear the Advanced data: All Site Data (localStorage, indexedDB, webSQL, serviceworkers, fileSystems), Saved Passwords (passwords), AutoFill Forms (formData), and Plugin Data (pluginData).

🚀 Lightweight extension with a neat & clean user interface. No Ads.

🥷 100% Data Privacy. No Tracking.

🆓 Free to use. No Signup. No Premium.
